description: The Marine Headquarters where the climactic battle reaches its conclusion with Whitebeard's death and Blackbeard's shocking power reveal.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard Covers Whitebeard's Body
keyEvents.description: The mysterious ritual where Blackbeard covers Whitebeard's corpse with a black cloth to steal his Devil Fruit power takes place at Marineford.
keyEvents.significance: Marineford becomes the location of one of the most shocking and mysterious events in One Piece history.

keyEvents.title: Blackbeard Reveals Dual Devil Fruit Powers
keyEvents.description: At Marineford, Blackbeard demonstrates the unprecedented ability to wield two Devil Fruit powers, shocking everyone present.
keyEvents.significance: Marineford witnesses the breaking of one of the fundamental rules of the One Piece world.

keyEvents.title: Akainu Pursues Luffy Through Marineford
keyEvents.description: The relentless chase continues across Marineford as Akainu climbs from below the cliff to pursue the escaping Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: The final stages of the desperate escape from Marineford, with multiple allies risking their lives to protect Luffy.

statusHistory.reason: Marineford has been heavily damaged by the war, with parts destroyed by the battle

description: The archipelago where people watch the broadcast of Whitebeard's death and witness the end of an era.

keyEvents.title: Civilians React to News of Whitebeard's Death
keyEvents.description: People at Sabaody Archipelago watch the broadcasts from Marineford and react with shock to the news of Whitebeard's death, recognizing it will shake the foundation of the world.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the global impact of the events at Marineford, with Sabaody serving as a witness location for the world-changing news.

keyEvents.title: Rayleigh Watches Whitebeard's Death
keyEvents.description: Silvers Rayleigh watches the news of Whitebeard's death at Sabaody with a mixture of tears and a smile, bidding farewell to the old legend.
keyEvents.significance: Sabaody becomes the location where one legend mourns another, marking the passing of an era.

statusHistory.reason: Sabaody continues to function normally while receiving news of the war
